item.title: Russian officials make ultimatums on NATO, Ukraine as Saudi Arabia peace talks begin
item.description: Russian officials say Ukrainian membership in NATO is a red line in peace talks as they met with U.S. officials in Saudi Arabia on Tuesday.

item.title: South Carolina bill would ban smoking inside cars while children are passengers
item.description: A South Carolina group of senators introduced a new bill this week that would ban smoking in a vehicle with a child 12 years or younger present.
